channel.title: How to set what players start with?
channel.description: in my server there is a thing called ::starter command, how to edit what you get out of it??. and how to make new commands ? :) like ::master ::pure, and how to edit for one characther only to have the commands ::givemod ::demote ::giveadmin?? :)

item.title: How to set what players start with?
item.dc:creator: @Bakpao Bakpao
item.description:
@Bakpao wrote:

Exactly, or if not you got a wrong base and need to stop download a right one.

Read full topic
item.source: How to set what players start with?

item.title: How to set what players start with?
item.dc:creator: @Kingen50cent Kingen50cent
item.description:
@Kingen50cent wrote:

What are you using a 508 Or a 317 server?

[b]If it is a 317 server there must be a Client.java file it’s called “Client” It’s one of the first files in your server folder.

If it is a 508 server then you should edit the login.java i think. i don’t know about 508’s+ since
i only use 317’s.[/b]

Read full topic

item.title: How to set what players start with?
item.dc:creator: @wwe4eva wwe4eva
item.description:
@wwe4eva wrote:

Client.java

if starter = 0

Edit the bits that say addItem(995, 25000000); Or whatever yours is.

And for ::master, ::pure etc, your server should already have them. Search for "master, also in client.java

Read full topic
